meanings.sent1: The classroom was chaotic due to the indisciplines of the students.
meanings.sent2: The team's indisciplines led to their defeat in the match.
meanings.sent3: The indisciplines of the puppies made them impossible to train.
meanings.sent4: The garden, overrun by weeds, was a visual representation of indisciplines.
meanings.sent5: The indisciplines in time management caused him to miss important deadlines.

meanings.definition: Failure to adhere to rules or regulations
meanings.sent1: The company faced consequences due to financial indisciplines.
meanings.sent2: The indisciplines in following safety protocols resulted in accidents.
meanings.sent3: The indisciplines in parking led to chaos in the crowded lot.
meanings.sent4: Her constant indisciplines in budgeting left her in financial trouble.
meanings.sent5: The indisciplines in submitting assignments on time affected his grades negatively.
